template.name: slsusb2.0 PortInterface
template.description: A Simple program to perform read/write operation on using slsusb2.0 interface on memory
template.details: This example reads operation code from host through slsusb2.0 hal driver and performs BULK OUT/IN operation. \n\nThis example runs on the Nios II 'standard', 'full_featured', 'fast', and 'low_cost' example designs. It runs with or without RTOS and requires a STDOUT device in your system's hardware. See the readme.txt for details.
